Humans need to travel from one place to another easily .
The current car's technology , the fuel injection has satisfied that need , but dissatisfies environment's need .
Humans need a car which not only able to transport them easily but also friendly to the environment .
It is engineers' job to apply their creative energies in designing a solution which meets humans' need .
First of all , the current car's technology , the fuel injection has satisfied humans' need to travel .
For example , the time taken to travel from one place to another with a distance of a few hundred kilometres has reduced from 2-3 days to 2-3 hours as a result , humans are able to travel instantly .
This is indeed makes human's mean of transportation rises to another level .
Second , in contrast with the benefit which the fuel injection has contributed to humans' life , it has polluted the environment .
This is due to the fuel processing in the car .
For example , the fuel injection is exhausting Carbon Dioxide as a result of incomplete burning of fuels .
Carbon dioxide is a greenhouse gas that traps the earth's heat and contributes to global warming .
Third , humans not only need to travel but also need a pollution free environment to live in .
In the view of this issue , engineers are needed to design a solution .
According to Khandani  , products or systems are designed to meet human needs by engineers .
For years , engineers have experimented to design a solution to this issue .
For example , Japan's engineers have experimented for about 10 years before they successfully designed an eco-car which makes use of electric energy .
This eco-car has no fuel tank therefore produce no emissions at all .
On top of that , Japan's eco-car is as fast as the fuel injection car .
Lastly , Japan's engineers had followed engineering design processes , Khandani  , to design their first eco-car .
They started by defining the problem of the fuel injection system .
They defined that the fuel injection system's problem lies on the fuel it uses .
Therefore , Japan's engineers started to look for alternate fuel for their eco-car .
They gathered information in order to arrive successfully at the right fuel's source subsequently , they decided to use electricity as the fuel .
The road to success is not smooth likewise , Japan's engineers had gone through a lot of challenges and tests before they arrived at their final prototype of Japan's first eco-car .
Humans need to care about the environment's condition , in order to preserve it for the new generation .
The new generation deserves to live in the same environment as we do .
To conclude , by using engineering design processes , engineers can design product that meets humans' need .
Healthcare is a basic essential in every country .
It compromises of the people's living condition , availability of medical treatment and prevention of disease .
Emphasis on healthcare services differs from country to country .
For instance in Singapore and Japan , healthcare is emphasized on the elderly due to their aging populations but both execute their policies in a different way .
Hence , we will look at the principle of healthcare of the elderly in respective countries and the solution to the healthcare needs of an aging population .
The aging community has become an eminent issue in Singapore .
With a replacement rate of 1 .5 children to 2 adults and estimation that by 2030 , 18 .4% of the population will be make up of the elderly , it is no wonder why Singapore government is promoting reproduction in young couples .
As the population ages , the main users of hospital services will be the old aged .
Therefore , improvement in healthcare services for the elderly is essential .
Mobility of the elderly is a factor as well , as they have problems walking and moving around .
According to a survey in 2004 , Singapore is named one of the unfriendliest countries towards the wheel chair bounded .
Hence , there is a need for us to better the healthcare services of our older citizens .
In Japan , nearly one quarter of the population is made up of the old aged .
This is mainly due to the speed of industrialization in Japan .
Being one of the economic giants , Japan industrializes very fast at an early stage .
This causes an imbalance between work and family .
The fast paced society force citizens to place work as priority over family resulting in a declining population .
In addition , in Japan , pay increases with the age of the workers .
Hence , companies tend to seek younger employees causing the older workers to lose their jobs and their health pension benefits .
Since the number of old aged is increasing , it is important to cater to their needs in terms of healthcare .
The first concern is the living condition of the old aged .
Home care facilities such as hospice day care centre and nursing home are built to look after the elderly especially when their family members are unable to do so .
For example , in Singapore , one room apartment with specially installed emergency buttons and lifts are catered to the elderly .
These apartments are created in such a way that they minimize the risk of the elderly injuring themselves .
The second concern is the mobility of the elderly .
Shopping malls and other common places should be equipped with more ramps and handicapped friendly escalator .
Furthermore , on trains in Singapore , certain seats are allocated for the elderly .
Last but not least , health benefits for elderly should be protected .
They should be offered free medical checkups and treatment if necessary .
In conclusion , healthcare services should not be neglected especially in countries , which face aging population .
More need to be done to improve our healthcare sector so as to achieve a healthier and wealthier society .
Over the past century , numerous research breakthroughs and creative innovations have allowed engineering design processes to meet various human needs .
According to Khandani  , engineering designs are systems that are introduced by humans through combining different technologies and innovations to satisfy a particular human need creating ability for humans to complete a task faster or more efficiently .
To produce these systems , design processes are carried out over a period of time , ranging from months to years , and they are conducted based on a series of steps .
For example , water supply has been a main concern for the Singapore government as Singapore has no natural sources of water .
Consequently , after years of research and design in aim to alleviate this problem , the NEWater technology was invented .
This technology allows used water to be reusable after undergoing treatment through microfiltration and reverse osmosis .
This is an example in which a particular human need has been satisfied by an engineering design system .
Even though engineering design processes have been aiding humans in meeting many of their needs in the past , many others have yet to be satisfied and the need to tackle pollution is one of them .
Pollution has been an ongoing problem for the past few decades or so and thus far , little has been done to alleviate this problem .
Global warming , as a result , is becoming more and more an issue of raising concern as little has been done to eliminate or tremendously reduce pollution .
Temperature has been increasing due to the excessive release of greenhouse gases and sea levels have been rising due to the melting of ice caps in the North and South poles .
Time is running out and to protect the sustainability of life on Earth , necessary actions have to be taken immediately if not , as soon as possible and the help of engineering design processes should not be left out .
First and foremost , vehicles have been a main source of pollution and a large contributor to the emission of greenhouse gases .
In the past , vehicles used to emit harmful gases such as carbon monoxide .
Subsequently , engineering design processes have made possible the invention of catalytic converters which convert the harmful gases emitted by vehicles into non- harmful gases .
On the flip side , although the problem of the emission of harmful gases has been handled , vehicles today are releasing carbon dioxide , which is a greenhouse gas , instead .
Consequently , a new engineering design process has to be carried out to rectify this problem .
After years of research , then comes the idea of inventing an environmentally-friendly car also known as an ecocar .
For example , a group of Engineering and Design students from Singapore has invented its first environmentally-friendly car which does not emit any amount of carbon .
This is an example of a great breakthrough of an engineering design process which will be able to tackle the problem of pollution .
Another area of concern that is contributing much to the pollution of the environment is energy generation .
Power stations , also known as power plants , are common sources of energy in most countries and they make use of the combustion of fuels to produce energy in powering up the whole city .
Due to the combustion of fuels , pollution occurs and taking into consideration that many countries have adopted the use of power stations , the effects of polluting the environment occur on a large scale .
Therefore , cleaner sources of energy generation have to be discovered and engineering design processes can do just that .
An example of a clean method of energy generation would be the invention of solar technology .
Solar technology makes use of heat and radiation from the Sun to produce useful forms of energy and this is made possible by engineering design processes .
To conclude , pollution is an ongoing , serious problem in which swift actions need to be taken .
It is a human need to neutralize this situation because Earth's and human's sustainability is at stake .
With engineering design processes , the benefits of gaining control over pollution are tremendous .
However , engineering design processes take a certain period of time as factors such as safety and other side effects have to be put into consideration too .
Moreover , we humans cannot be totally dependent on engineering design systems only .
We have to be socially-responsible as every living person has a part to play in tackling pollution .
Throughout the years , there has always been a debate on whether technology shapes society , a technologically determinist perspective , or does society shape technology , a socially determinist view .
One such technology that is closely related to this debate is the invention of the automobiles .
Without this invention , we would probably still be riding the bicycle to work or school .
Looking back at history , we can see how this important technology has been shaped by societal factors as well as technological factors .
Due to the influence of these factors , the gasoline powered cars have won over the electric cars for years .
Firstly , societal factors like the expansion of cities favor the gasoline cars over electric cars .
As cities grow bigger , it becomes impractical to have an electric car for travelling .
For example , the gasoline powered cars can travel an average of about 300km on a full tank of petrol as compared to a maximum distance of 150km for a full charge on an electric battery .
In big cities like the United States , travelling to and fro from work can easily surpass 100km .
Also with the expansion of society , time becomes money .
No one is willing to spend 8 hours a day waiting for their car to be charged fully before they can make use of it .
Next , technological factors current available technology and limitation of resources have also helped shaped the automobiles .
With current technology , more hybrid cars are showing up on the market .
Hybrid cars involves either part gasoline part electric or part gasoline part compressed natural gas  .
This is made possible only with the advancement of technology as compared to the past .
For instance , the regenerative brake system has been invented whereby you charge your battery just by braking .
Car manufacturers like Chevrolet are cashing in on this possible new market , and coming up with new models like the Optra Magnum CNG in 2008 .
With a cleaner and efficient hybrid car , more people are opting for the switch .
The gasoline powered car has finally seen a worthy competitor .
However , technological restrains like limited resources has been a set back for hybrid users .
Looking at Singapore for example , there are only 5 CNG refueling points around the country .
To get your vehicle refueled would be troublesome if the nearest CNG petrol station is far away .
This constrain makes consumers think twice before purchasing a hybrid vehicle .
Also , the fact that hybrid cars are a relatively new technology , car repair shops might not have the knowledge to repair hybrid cars yet , and any repairs must be sent back to the car manufacturer .
This makes it inconvenient if the shop is located far away from the consumer .
In short , these few factors have played an important role in shaping the automobiles that we know today .
Imagine if there no technological restrains and that we could create a self replenishing battery .
The possibilities are endless , but it proves one point .
Technology and society co-exist and affects one another .
Even till now , we are shaping many other technological inventions .
Only the future can foretell the impact of these factors on technological advancement such as in the automobile industry .
Who knows , hybrid cars might actually manage to successfully dethrone the gasoline powered cars in the near future .
Electronics such as lights and cars have become essential to the human beings over the past years .
These electronics though wonderful , but they consume a huge amount of energy .
Given that the global price of fuel is on the rise , users of these electronics are incurring higher cost .
One current human need that should be given priority for engineering design is to have cost saving electronics .
Firstly , the problems with lights is that , in order to save electricity , the user will have to manually turn off the lights upon leaving the area , which is rather impractical in places such as offices , toilets and classrooms which require the lights to be constantly turned on .
The idea of electricity conservation on usage of lights was to have the lights automatically turned off when the area is empty .
As a result , the idea sparked off the concept of integrating motion sensors to lights .
The milestone in having a motion sensor light to automatically turn on and off the lights with the presence of a human being was how to accurately identify the presence of a human being in the area monitored by the sensor .
To overcome the milestone , the motion sensors use infrared energy to detect human beings .
In addition , these sensors are also highly sensitive to human body temperature , therefore resulting in a highly accurate detection .
Today these motion sensor lights are used almost everywhere , in offices , toilets , classrooms and even homes .
Secondly , the recent price hikes in petrol fuel have caused human beings to pay a higher amount of money for their car petrol as compared to previously .
To overcome the price hikes , an alternative to petrol fuel is needed .
The outcome of intensive engineering design was to replace petrol fuel with Compressed Natural Gas .
These natural gases are widely available on earth as compared to petrol fuel which is getting limited as the oil reserves depletes .
In order for a car to be powered using CNG , there are certain modifications that needs to be done .
For example , new fuel storage was introduced , and took the name of Integrated Storage system .
Another example is the modification of the engine .
The natural gas from the storage cylinders flows into a fuel line when the engine is started .
The gas is then ignited by a spark plug , thus powering the car .
In Singapore , public transports such as taxis , buses have converted to CNG .
In addition , according to Channel NewsAsia , there is an increasing number of private cars owners converting their conventional petrol fuel powered cars to CNG cars .
Engineering designs have improved the designs of lights and cars , which used to consume a huge amount of energy in the past .
To sum up , with the depletion of natural resources and high electricity and fuel cost , engineering designing should be given priority to cost saving electronics .
Engineering design is the process of creating a system or products to meet the desired needs of people .
Usually , engineers face difficulty in designing a product or coming out with ideas that are of demand by the public .
As an engineer , he needs to define the problem , gather pertinent information , generate and analyse multiple solutions and finally , test and implement whether the solution works .
However , the two most disturbing problems that may hamper engineering design processes for innovations are the inability to generate multiple solutions to convince their superior to implement their products or ideas and the failure of constantly creating a product that are of demand .
Firstly , in the aspect of generating multiple solutions , engineers often face the problems off lacking of funds and unable to convince their superior that their idea is feasible .
In most cases , their design will be rejected because the product or idea is not conventional .
Their idea or product is a total new concept which people may find it hard to accept because of traditional idea or product that may have etched in their mind .
For example , in the Singapore National Service , the professional nature of the military officers , using its portion of dominant influence , typically make most of the important decisions about innovation .
In addition , the low ranking cadets usually fail to convince the high ranking officers that their innovative products or ideas may improve the military .
One example is the introduction of unmanned combat air vehicles by the engineers in the military .
This unmanned combat air vehicle may be potent enough to replace the ubiquitous manned fighter in the near future .
However , due to the higher officer not having enough trust over the air vehicle being piloted by human , this unmanned combat vehicle project did not succeed in carrying out .
Instances such as the above example will significantly affect the morale of the engineers .
Hence , it is imperative to address the issue of engineers unable to convince their superior to implement their products or ideas .
As an engineer , if their ideas or products face constant rejection by their superior , they will stop coming up with new ideas or products as they see no purpose for coming up with new ideas or products and constantly opposing their superiors .
Thus , the superiority in company will significantly hamper engineer morale and their design .
Secondly , the other problem that restricts engineer design is the lack of confident to implement ideas or products that are of demand .
Although in the initial stage the surveying of their products response may be good , when it comes to implementing their ideas or products , the response may be of the reverse .
Engineers spend efforts in developing the products , but the final products that they design may not be of popular demand .
Society always strives for useful and economic products .
Products that are not practical and expensive will face rejection .
For instance , in the 1960s , Singapore developed a phone that was able to see the other caller .
This type of phone faced rejection because the phone was expensive and users found it infringing their privacy .
As a result , the sales of these phones were low , affecting the morale of the engineer who design this phone .
As an engineer , facing multiple failures may cause them to be disheartened and put them on high alert as they will be more careful when they want to design a product .
They will tend to feel disappointed because they need to solicit a lot of funds , putting in their utmost efforts when developing the products , and only to find out that their products face rejection by the public .
This will seriously restrict their innovation because they may be afraid to face constant failure .
The "best" design solution is always hard to develop because it is one that most completely fulfils the client's requirements .
Therefore , engineers may just stop at gathering pertinent information , and not go into generating multiple solutions as they are worry that their products may not be of demand as expected , which again hamper their design processes for innovations .
In conclusion , it is usually the lack of ability to convince the superiors and the constant rejection by the public that significantly hamper engineering design for innovations .
Traditional mindset should be changed and let engineers have a chance to develop their ideas .
Furthermore , engineers should do their research and marketing of their products effectively , such that product that they develop will be of marketing value .
Scientific technology has been developing rapidly since the first industrial revolution .
Meanwhile many new kind of innovative inventions come out almost in every day changing the way people living .
There exists a remarkable fact which is that a technical innovation is viewed different between different groups of people .
A wonderful invention to a group of people may be dislike to the other ones .
In general , the justification of the utility of a specific technology or invention depends on the specific perspectives from different group of people .
Space technology is a good example to explain the reason how different views come out .
Space technology is a kind of high innovative , high compositive and also high cost technology .
Its aim is to find out the unknown scientific questions and for military use .
The beginning of space technology derives from America and Russia .
Then it quickly spreads out to all over the world .
Nowadays European countries , China , Japan and India are all have a high development in space technology .
Toward this new technique , there are two opposite opinion exist in these days .
Government and scientists think it is worth to spend money and people working on this , and it will benefit the whole country .
However , many people look it in another way that it is a waste of resource which can be used to improve people's living condition .
If we look a little deeper into the causes that lead to the opposite solution , we will find that the focus that specific group of people pays attention to is , obviously , quite different from each other .
In the government and scientists' point of view , space technology is essential that it is the fundamental things we need to do to protect our country and fulfill future needs .
They pay lots attention to keep technique developing moving and more concentrate on the huge issue , like military demand , and the future .
That is also the reason why every country tries their best to improve the space technique .
Former president of America Regan even state the announcement of star war program , although it was given up at the end .
In conclusion , judgments towards a technical innovation or development always tend to different directions when these are made by different group of people .
All in all , the difference does really derive from the different thinking perspectives .
Because people tend to think about things associating with their own experience and life , different justification come out .
Why is the petroleum so important ?
Petroleum can be extracted and refined to produce fuels including petrol , paraffin , and diesel oil .
Without these extracted products from petroleum , cars cannot run , planes cannot fly , and ships cannot launch out .
The world may not run any more .
What's more , petroleum is a liquid mixture of hydrocarbons which is present in suitable rock strata and is not reproducible for now .
It is said that after 60 years , the world will run out of petroleum .
How are we going to solve this problem ?
There are two ways to solve this problem .
One way is to conserve and save the petroleum .
Engineers have brought out some solutions for saving the petroleum .
The greatest consumption of petroleum is in the transportation operation .
One of the engineer's solutions is to mix the alcohol and petrol together to provide the energy .
This solution is now in the test and implement period .
In Wuhan , one of the biggest cities in China , all the taxies are operating using this mixture fuel .
Another solution , which is almost the same concept , is the Hybrid-Electric Vehicle .
This kind of vehicles uses both electric power and fuel and is different from the previous version .
It combines the electric power system and fuel system together .
When the vehicle starts , it consumes the electric power .
After the speed of the car reaches a certain range , it will switch to fuel power system .
When using fuel power to start the car , the fuel is not fully burned .
That's why we can smell strong petrol when the car starts .
To do this concept of power system is to let the fuel fully used in order to save the fuel .
However , conservation alone cannot solve the problem .
The other way is to develop new energy resources to replace petroleum .
Hydrogen fuel cell , solar power and nuclear power are the three hottest topics that interested engineers most .
The research of fuel cell on vehicles was started in early 1960s and it gets well developed until now .
Most of car makers have come out with their own hydrogen fuel cell powered vehicles .
But hydrogen fuel cell vehicles are still in the test and implement phase .
There are some prototypes running on the road .
But for finalized product , the cost should be reduced and the efficiency of the cell should be increased .
Solar and nuclear power are the more advanced technology .
Solar power is in the experimental phase .
The key point to increase the efficiency of solar power is how to concentrate the sunshine .
If this point can be solved , the potential of solar power is prodigious .
For nuclear power , actually it is using the power generated by the nuclear fusion .
Nuclear fusion is the same way as the sun to generate its power .
The research of nuclear fusion has been processed for decades , but the progress is not so obvious .
In brief , the energy problem is one of the most serious problems to us now .
So we need to be step by step , follow the right rules , to get the best solution of this urgent problem .
We live in an era of great change , an increasingly global society as a result of rapid growth in information and communication technologies .
However the above only holds through for those who are not stricken with poverty .
Surely the needs of these people , most of whom are based in developing countries , are endless .
The need for basic infrastructure ranks high on their priorities .
This is because basic infrastructure is the basis for any country to develop essential facilities like transport , housing and education , to help the poor .
The engineering design process is an effective way through which the needs of these people could be met comprehensively .
According to Kandani , the very first step in any engineering design is to identify the need and to define the problem .
The word 'need' refers a man's desire for a certain product or system .
This need is usually identified by the society and may vary from society from society .
Thus needs which are considered a necessity to some might actually be a luxury to others .
For example , infrastructure is a real need for those living in the rural villages in Asia but not for the nomads in Africa , although both groups are affected by poverty .
The nomads would prefer to conserve the forests and wildlife so as to be able to carry on their nomadic lifestyle .
This example clearly illustrates the importance of establishing the need accurately so that engineers would be able to work effectively towards solving the problem .
The second step of this engineering design process is to gather essential information .
In this step , engineers analyze the existing solutions and pick out the pros and cons .
Economic , environmental and safety factors are also analyzed .
Many developing countries have made big plans on establishing infrastructure in the rural areas in an attempt to bridge the gap in the standard of living between the urban towns and suburban villages .
However , these plans tend to get hit by delays after delays because of various reasons .
So it's vital for engineers to collect as much information as possible so as to not repeat the mistakes and go down the same slippery slope of their predecessors .
Once this is done , engineers can start to formulate multiple solutions .
This step urges engineers to temporarily throw the rulebook out of the window , open up their minds and explore many different ideas and possibilities .
Dr . Kandani suggests that a team with professionals from different fields be formed .
This team can work together and share their knowledge and expertise to come up with a few solutions .
The most logical step after you have come up with a few solutions is to pick the best one .
This is actually the decisionmaking process , after studying the various solutions .
For instance , if a school is being built , based in the land available , few designs would have already thought off .
Certain schools might be able to hold more students while not proving to be as stable as another that hold fewer students but is very much stronger .
So it is in this step that engineers make the decision of which design to adopt while weighing in all the factors to come up with a viable solution .
In conclusion , I would like to recommend the engineering design process because it's very complete in its steps to provide a solution to those in need .
The establishment of basic infrastructure in developing countries through engineering design will give the poor an avenue to success fully escape from the vicious cycle of poverty .
The world today is undergoing global warming which is caused by the burning of fossil fuels and deforestation .
The solution to this problem is the harnessing of an alternative form of energy called kinetic energy in wind .
An example of a product created for this purpose is the wind turbine and it is created using the three main steps in design process to address the problem which are problem definition , information gathering and testing and implementing of solutions .
The first step in the design process is the problem definition .
Following this procedure helps to generate more solutions to the problem addressed .
Tapping of kinetic energy in wind is a good solution as wind is abundant due to the frequent changes in the atmospheric pressure .
It announces to the engineers that Earth is in grave danger , thus giving them more motivation to think of a solution .
For example , by defining the problem as the fast decreasing quantity of fossil fuels , it gives engineers an insight to create a product which can be used to tap kinetic energy in wind .
Referring to the earlier models of windmills like those built in Sistan , Iran , from the seventh century , which were used to grind rice grains , engineers used the same concept to create wind turbine which converts kinetic energy in wind to electrical energy .
The second step in the design process is the gathering of information .
The credibility of the problem needs to be addressed after the problem has been defined .
The important factor which determines the efficiency of the wind turbine is the general wind flow in the area where the wind turbine is built .
Since the wind turbine heavily depends on the wind to generate electricity , it is important to study the wind flow pattern before the wind turbine is built .
For this study , past weather forecasts and also the internet play vital roles in providing information needed to improve the efficiency of the wind turbine .
The overall gain in electrical energy needs to be calculated to decide whether the building of wind turbine is worth its value .
The last step in the design process is the testing and implementing of solutions .
The testing and implementing solutions is closely related to the analysis of the design solution .
The main factor which contributes to the analysis is marketability .
For example , the Matilda built at Goland , Sweden produced a surprisingly high sixty-one gigawatts per hour of electricity in fifteen years which produced more energy than the other typical wind turbines .
However , the Matilda was demolished on June 6 , 2008 .
In conclusion , the main three steps in the design process help to create a guideline for the engineers to follow .
Problem definition requires knowledge of wind and thus making full use of it .
In terms of information gathering , the efficiency of the wind turbine is of paramount importance in determining whether it really solves the problem .
Lastly , the testing and implementing of solutions consists of marketability , ergonomics and safety which serve as a check on whether the product is deemed suitable to solve the problem .
Nowadays , engineering design products are cores for everything .
Engineering systems play important roles in all the fields for example entertainment , healthcare as well as education .
Although it is essential for all the fields , engineering products and systems in healthcare and medical fields should be given the highest priority since health is the most important thing for all human beings .
Designing of medical products which can make all human beings young and old as well as disabilities easier and safer is obviously important .
Moreover , some medical products like "Fall Detection System" and "Posture monitoring system" can even help people save life in some ways .
On the other hand , people spend much more time normally for entertainment than healthcare .
As a result there are mass products for entertainment because of high demand .
Instead , healthcare products should be widely available and used .
There are many healthcare products which are available in research organization but not widely available in current market .
For example , "Fall Detection System" which can detect the fall of person especially elder people and can send instant message via sms to relatives so that the person can get immediate help in critical situations .
As mentioned in "Global action on aging" website that the number of senior citizens are rising and the action for this should be taken , it is obvious that increasing number of elder people and taking care of them has been necessary to be considered .
It is also mentioned that since the number of elderly people increases , the burden of caring is also increasing for young people .
Hence , engineering should consider the situation of increasing number of elders and come out with the solution which can take care of situation in order to help elder people safe as well as make youth work without worry .
Although there are R&Ds for healthcare products for monitoring and taking care of elder people , these devices are not widely used in the market .
So , in order to get this situation , engineers should think about the ways that can make the design process meet the need of the market situation .
In order to make engineering design product meet the needs , first of all , clear and unambiguous definition of this problem should be defined .
Problems should be widely and well defined by engineers , elder people as well as adults so that more innovative products and ideas come out .
Moreover , it is also necessary to make sure that there is enough information to generate clear problem definitions that addresses the real need .
Once alternative solutions coming out , engineers need to analyze and decide bested suited solution to implement  .Government and organization are also responsible to support R&D process in order to gather information needed , generate multiple solutions , analyze solutions and test as well as implement solutions which are the necessary steps for the design process .
In conclusion , engineers should try to get preferable situation in the market for the products , for example , "Fall Detection System" which can take care of elder people and "Posture monitoring system" which can help people of all ages to maintain best posture with the help of government and organizations as well as consumers .
And the goal can also be achieved by developing most suitable design engineering process for the system and products for healthcare .
A human need is a necessity that human required in order to survive .
One main necessity is food .
According to the World Food Program's 2008 report , 25000 people are dying every day due to famine and related issue .
A large portion of the deaths comes from the Third World Countries like Africa and India .
By using the Engineering Design Process introduced by Seyyed Khandani , a professor at Diablo Valley College , we can reduce the famine .
Some factors that play a part in of famine include political , technological and environmental issues .
The World Food Program has been providing food and aids to areas affected by famine since it established .
By using the engineering design process , the first step is to define the problem .
The definition of the problem is straight forward in the beginning , the people are starving , so they provide food .
However , for Malawi , the WFP and the World Bank analyzed the solution and found out that it is better to donate cash to them as they did some researches and found out that the country has food resources , but the poor cannot afford it .
In 1990s , the WFP introduced the donation of cash and vouchers policies one of the pioneer countries that received this aids is Malawi .
Thus , providing cash did not only help to solve the famine , it also improved the financial situation for the farmers .
Furthermore , the WFP saved time and cost from the collection of food and delivering it to the affected areas .
In 1970s , the WFP has been providing food to India to temporarily solve the famine .
During this period , they have been analyzing the situation to generate other solutions to permanently solve the famine .
According to the design process , the second step is to gather related information , then generate various solutions .
The first off solution is to provide genetically modified seeds and fertilizers to the farmers , so that they will obtain higher yield .
Before this solution was implemented , they did a further study , and realized that the solution will not work as the farmers are using traditional farming methods which are not yield efficient .
Hence , the WFP provided machines and farming education to the farmers in the 1980s .
These aids have improved the famine situation as the famine dropped by about 20% in a WFP's 1990s report On the other hand , these solutions are not applicable to all the lands in India as various areas have different types of lands .
For the dry lands , the WFP has do further researches on water irrigation methods .
One of the solutions is to construct a drainage system from the Indira Ghandi canal to irrigate the dry lands in the region .
Some events like drought , flood and earthquakes are causes to famine .
These types of events are unavoidable .
Nevertheless , events like deforestation and overgrazing has affected the fertile lands and caused the yield to go down .
While governments spend millions and billions of dollars on entertainments and military expenditure yearly , these large amount of money can be put to good use in helping their own people .
India has increased the military spending by 50% in 2008 , bringing the amount to 40 billion dollars despite that 35% of the people are still affected by famine .
The famine caused by these situations is preventable .
That large amount of money can be invested in the agriculture sector , like having the technology to plant seeds that will grow on dry land , which will greatly solve the famine .
In conclusion , the WFP can do more researches and analysis , like creating genetic modified seeds that can survive in dry or wet land , or an indoor farming center that will shelter the crops from natural disasters , which will resolve the famine issue .
In addition , the governments can try to allocate more budgets to the agriculture and research center than invested tons of money on entertainment sector , which is redundant when people in their own country are suffering without having a basic need .
The last step of the design process is to test and implement the solution .
By moving a small step forward , will reduce the famine .
Poverty is unavoidable , but famine is preventable .
Thus , we should do more to help the people that are suffering from famine .
Another value of radio was its ability to perform mass communication .
As the average cost of production declined steadily , radio set was mass produced leading to the birth of radio broadcasting .
Broadcasting allows single directional flow of communication where important information can be disseminated to the mass quickly and effectively .
Warnings and announcements regarding weather or disaster evacuation can be made via broadcasting will greatly help in minimising the casualty rate in a disaster as the mass can receive vital and timely information and instruction even when the cable lines are damaged .
The other factors that influence the development of radio will be military demands .
The need for communication between joined military operations across forces and formations lead to the development of powerful signal set .
To prevent enemies from tapping on their communications or disrupting their signals , technology such as "anti-jamming" was developed by the military .
Besides improving on communication , military demands had also led to the invention of radar which uses radio wave in detecting distance objects and getting information such as their location and movement .
The technology of radar was soon transferred to civil usage such as by the commercial planes and ships due to its usefulness in navigation .
Another development of radio by military is guided weapon which arises from the need to raise accuracy of weapon in decreasing the chances of damaging and injuring civilian or allied forces .
In conclusion , radio is an important technology that is still being developed and improved continuously .
From its communication values to other discovered usages , economic factor and military demands have played a positive role in its overall development .
Invention and development of radio has better the society in numerous ways .
A need refers to what is required in order to do something or achieve some state of being .
'Human needs' , for example , have been taken to describe requirements which must be satisfied if harm to an agent is to be avoided .
Overpopulation is one of the current human needs that should be given priority .
Size or Density of the population affects the overpopulation .
In the world where the human populations are growing , we should focus on solving the problem of insufficient land to maintain the life on earth .
The houses today are stronger , and some of them can withstand natural disaster .
For example in Japan , a country where earthquake happen often , their engineer is trying to solve the problem of building a building that can withstands earthquake .
By using the Khandani Principle , the engineers gather pertinent information about the earthquake and manage to implement a solution after several test had been conducted , called Seismic retrofitting method , where Seismic retrofitting is the changing of existing building to a structure that is more resistant to ground motion  , soil failure due to earthquakes or seismic activity .
Engineers try to solve overpopulation by combine many houses into one building , thus building multi-unit housing or also known as attached dwellings has been invented .
Apartment , barracks , tenement and terrace house is good example of multi-unit housing .
Engineer applied Khandani principle that time , they define the problem and has gather enough information to make sure the building will not collapse .
For example , in Singapore , where the land is very small , engineers build a lot of condominiums and apartments to solve the problem of insufficient houses and manage to save some of the land for other purposes .
In the future , the population will increase much more , and by building more multi-unit housing cannot solve the problem effectively .
In my opinion , engineer should focus on upgrading the building .
They should implement the solution of building multiple level basements for multi-unit housing and building since we don't really use a lot of the underground space .
Building multiple level basements may cause some other potential problems and engineer should try to solve these .
Engineers have to analyze every possible problem that may occur like water seepage , internal condensation , underground virus and bad acoustics when building more underground level .
That is why building more underground level , we need to use Khandani principle 2005 ,that is require engineer to gather a lot of pertinent information from any sources available before implement it .
In conclusion , with Khandani's engineering design process , engineers can generate a perfect solution to solve overpopulation .
If we compare the house 10000 BC to the modern house today , engineering design process is apparent .
If in the world we don't have engineering design process , engineers may generate solution that is ineffective or it may cause harm to other life form .
There are many human needs in the world and the engineering design process can help to meet those needs in a better way .
The issue of the depletion of earth's natural resources have been raised repeatedly throughout recent times .
The earth's natural resources are not well distributed across the globe , and hence some countries face the problem of the lack of certain natural resources .
Singapore , due to its small land size area also face the problem of the lack of natural resources .
In particular , the issue of the lack of water has been the headlines for many times .
In order for Singapore to be self-reliance on water , there is a need for Singapore to create portable water resources for its people .
Singapore had tried a number of ways in its bid to shift towards self- reliance of water .
This includes desalination and damping up of rivers to form water catchment areas .
However , these methods are still short of providing for the growing need of water of its people .
In recent years , the nation's engineers have come up with a purification process which can purify waste water into portable water for use .
The product of it is called New water .
New water is treated waste water that had undergone stringent purification processes using advance dual membrane and ultraviolet technology .
The product can be bottled for consumption or be mixed with reservoir water and then going through the usual water treatment to produce drinkable water .
Currently , New water is supplying Singapore with 15% of its water demands .
There are plans to scale up the project to contribute 30% of the water supply by 2010 .
The quality of the product is even assured by many international experts .
This is indeed a product of system which is engineered to meet the human need for natural resources .
The design process of the system has undergone 5 design process stages as illustrated by Khandani in his Engineering Design process paper .
Firstly , the team of engineers working on the New water project identified the problem which is the lack of water resources for Singapore .
Singapore has been buying water from Malaysia , its neighbouring country in order to supplement its own water supply .
However , the water agreements with Malaysia are expiring soon in 2011 & 2061 .
The agreements have been providing for 40% of the country needs .
Therefore , the engineers identified the need for Singapore to shift towards self-sustainability in terms of water resources .
Secondly , they gather pertinent information on the technologies and usage of water that is purified from waste water .
However , the first masterplan was shelved because of the great cost and unreliability of the process .
The cost incurred will offset the benefit that it may bring .
Hence , the team decided to wait for further technological advancement before building its first plant .
They eventually build its first plant after the technology of dual membrane purification has matured and the production cost has come down .
Thirdly , prior to the implementation of the New water technology , there are also multiple solutions to the problem of lack of water resources in Singapore .
Solutions include desalination of sea water and damping up more rivers to increase the water catchment area .
The desalination of seawater will require large amount of fossil fuel to run which is another natural resource that Singapore do not have .
Furthermore , the desalination plants will also leave a larger carbon footprint .
Despite these , a desalination plant is still build because of the growing demand .
The damping up of rivers to form water catchment areas is in fact being implemented .
Marina barrage the newest kid on the block was formed by damping the marina channel to form a large water catchment area capable of meeting 10% of Singapore's need .
However , as Singapore has limited land , we cannot go on forever creating water catchment area from our land .
Therefore , New water is decided as a solution needed to meet the need for water of the Nation .
Finally , in May 2000 , the first New water plant is completed .
Currently there are 4 New water plant in Singapore with a fifth on its way .
Together , they will be able to meet 30% of Singapore's need .
Bottled New water were also given out during National events , promoting the use of the New water in our daily life .
In conclusion , New water has been a engineering design which was designed to meet the human need of the lack of water resources particularly in Singapore .
Throughout the history of human , there are a lot of successful products which have great effect on human life , just like television , cell phone and so on .
It is not only their high level technology that makes them so successful , but also that they meet the need of the people .
Electric car , which is first invented by General Motors Company  , is such an interesting case .
The invention of electric cars is both successful and failure .
We can analysis it in both social and technological aspects .
Electric car is the product of social reasons .
As we know , ordinary car's fuel is gas which is used since the first car has been produced .
While there exists a problem that the burning of gas gives off poisonous gas and large amount of carbon dioxide which cause serious air pollution .
Furthermore , as it is mineral resource , the storage of gas is becoming less and less which directly leads to the rise of the price .
Because of the reasons stated above , people want to invent a kind of vehicle which can use cleaner and cheaper energy instead of gas .
That is why the electric cars came into being .
Another direct reason social reason is that in the early 1990s , the California and Arizona state governments had raised a policy which said at least 10 percent of the cars produced in the automobile companies should be environmental friendly , in another word is nonpolluting .
This promoted the research of electric cars .
In the mean time , GM also wanted to use this opportunity to restore their position in automobile world .
This is the social reasons that do favor to electric car .
While , there are also some negative social sides .
Thanks to nearly a hundred years developing , the foundation of the gas industry was quite strong .
There were a lot of big gas companies tried a lot of methods to promote their products in order to push electric cars out of the market .
For example a gas company even asked for the President of America , Bush , to appear in their advertisement .
So you can imagine the difficult situation electric car's companies met at that time .
The technological aspect is also very important .
At that time , the electric car was mainly made of aluminum which gave the car lighter weight and the shape was aerodynamically styled which could reduce the air resistance .
Both of the two features provided the electric car faster speed .
As it was powered by electricity , there was less noise .
Driving such a car could be quite an enjoyable experience .
While , technology was not fully developed at that time and the battery could only support the electric car to run at most 100 miles .
Furthermore , most of the gas stations did not offer the service to charge the electric car , so it is very inconvenient for people to travel long distance .
So , the electric cars couldn't be widely used .
While recently the companies of electric cars have realized the importance of social and technological factors and they start to fight back .
In social aspect , the environment situation becomes more serious than twenty years ago .
The crude oil production rate reduces .
The price of gas goes higher and higher .
Again people become interested in electric cars and the companies also take these advantages to promote their products .
They also invited some superstars , like Tom Hanks , to help advertise the car .
In technological aspect , new kind of battery has be developed .
The travelling range has been expanded to 500 miles , nearly five times farther than before .
Many functions , like GPS and ABS , are also applied to the electric car .
The performance of electric car can be as better as normal car .
Through the case of electric cars , we can see that whether a product can be successful or not is decided by both the social and technological factors .
The change of these conditions directly influences the position of the product in the market .
So when engineer produce a new product , taking these two aspects of factors into consideration is important .
With the development of the technology , people have more comfortable and beautiful clothes to wear , more enjoyable entertainment to participate , more delicious food to eat and more convenient transportation tools to use .
However , one of the most important factors seems to be forgotten by human beings: the place we live - the earth .
Nowadays , as our Earth Mother becomes hotter , human beings' living condition is greatly threatened by the global warming , the issue which is discussed fiercely among scientists .
As an engineer , we must also take this responsibility to protect our Earth Mother .
It is commonly known that global warming is caused by frequently industrial activities these years in detail , it is due to the emission of green house gas  .
However , this idea is not acceptable for some people they consider the climate change as the natural phenomenon .
Actually , if we refer to the figure of "Temperature VS CO2 Emission" , we can straightaway reach a conclusion .
We can surprisingly find that the two curves match each other , in other words , it implies that the growth of temperature has some kind of tendency toward the growth of the emission of CO2 .
So , it is hard to say that there is no relationship between these two issues .
In recent years , due to much more frequent industrial activities , the curve of emission of CO2 consequently jumps to a very high point , so does the curve of temperature .
Nowadays , the rising temperature has been paid much more attention because of some sudden , striking surprise , for instance , the melting ice in Antarctica , the rising sea level .
In conclusion , the threaten of global warming has come , we engineers need to face it bravely and design products against the climate change .
We have only one Earth Mother , we will never lose her .
As the progress of our society , human beings get stuck in a dilemma of energy .
On one hand , the energy resources we use now which are mainly fossil fuels will be exhausted soon if we continue to consume as current rate while the use of fossil fuels trigger out a series of environmental problems .
On the other hand , the development of society calls for larger and larger amount of energy , which makes us in desperate need of energy .
In order to develop our society without exhausting all the fossil fuels or sacrificing our environment , we have to find new energy resources to take place of traditional fossil fuels .
In this case , solar energy stands out becoming our first choice .
Engineering design play a significant role in the use of solar energy , especially in the system of solar heating .
In the first stage , engineering design mainly contributes by clearly defining the problem and gathering pertinent information .
In fact , humans began to utilize solar energy to heat water as early as 3000 years before .
However , the efficiency of solar energy was very slow .
The question how to make a efficient and effective solar heating system is addressed by engineers .
In order to find the solution , engineers spend large amount of time to collect the relative information , from which they can generate inspiration while draw lessons from the previous work .
Though this preliminary stage appears simple , actually it not only takes a lot of time and calls for patient , but also is the crucial fundamental of the solution .
That is not the end of engineering design .
What engineers do next is to test the system and make possible improvements .
Although solar energy has certain advantages compared to other kinds of energy , it has an inevitable disadvantage .
The solar energy is limited by various natural conditions , such as day and night , seasons , and places .
It is not stable enough so that people may not be able to use solar energy to heat water whenever they need .
To improve the solar heating system , engineers add accessorial energy equipment to it such as electrical heater .
This improvement makes it possible for people to get hot water fast and conveniently even when there is not enough sunlight .
In the current world people depend more and more on technology to improve their life , which stimulus the development of science and technology in reverse .
However , among so many kinds of human needs , some of them should be given priority because of their urgency .
In my opinion , we should pay most attention on the development of clean energy such as solar energy .
The reason why we should focus on the research of solar energy is that the atmospheric pollution caused by the consumption of fossil fuels is severe , there is enough amount of solar energy to be used on earth , and the diffusion and adoption of solar energy product is satisfying .
In fact , the research of solar energy can be traced back to the year of 1900 .
Although at that time they only focused on solar power plant .
Later , because of the decrease of petroleum and natural gas , the scientists paid attention to solar energy again .
Until today , the process of solar energy research is still quite difficult .
However , because of the severe pollution problem , we have to focus on the development of solar energy .
Nowadays , there are already various kinds of solar energy product in the market .
For example , people use solar energy converter to heat up water , which will save amazing amount of energy acquired from other ways .
Besides , the usage of solar panel should become more and more important in the future .
It is said that if we can cover a place of 40 ,000 square miles with solar panel , the demand for electricity of the whole world will be satisfied .
Also , solar energy is inexhaustible and we can use it without worrying about polluting the atmosphere , which really solved the problem brought by the consumption of fossil fuels .
Moreover , since the price of solar energy panel is decreasing recently , more and more consumers will think about the usage of solar energy panel .
In the 1980s and 1990s , the research of solar energy fell into the low tide because that the price of petroleum fell down and the solar energy product was too expensive and there was no important breakthrough about the development of solar energy product .
However , since the environmental pollution has become one of the most important topics in the world nowadays , we also should pay more attention to clean energy such as solar energy .
The usage of solar energy product will not only save large amount of energy and solve the problem of energy crisis but also give us a clean world with little pollution .
With the developmemt of the society , our demand for the various commodity keeps increasing .
We want to make our lives more comfortable and convenient .
However , without enough energy to manufacture the products , how can our desire be satisfied !
Therefore , the current human need to find endless energy source is becoming more and more urgent so that it should be given priority .
To satisfy the current human need , we ha better use Roger's Engineering design process to work out a supreme solution .
This process contains five steps: define the problem , gather pertinent information , generate multiple solutions , analyze and select a solution , test and implement the solution .
As we know , most of the energy we are consuming is fossil energy such as coal and oil which is limited .
If we just depend our future on fossil energy source , how can we live on after hundreds of years !
Just a few years ago , America declared a war against Iraq with the justification that there were bio-chemistry weapons in Iraq .
Obviously , it wanted the oil in Iraq .
This war alarms us that if we do not solve the energy problems , more wars may be declared in the future .
That is really disastrous and horrible .
However , there are many other kinds of energy source on the earth such as nuclear power , water power and solar power .
Now the problem is how to use these power to substitutde the fossil energy , which means how to convert these power into the energy that can be used by us such as electrical power .
To solve this problem , building electrical powerhouse may be the best choice .
The reason is that the electrical power is clean , easily transported and easily stored .
Therefore , different places can share the energy source .
The problems brought by the unbalanced energy source distribution are solved .
Although making use of nuclear power , water power and solar power seems feasible , there are some reasons that make solar power be the most appropriate .
Nuclear power can be very clean and can generate large quantities of electrical power .
Nevertheless , it can generate so huge power that it is very unsafe .
For instance , in 1986 , a nuclear powerhouse in Soviet Union exploded , which destroyed many buildings and claimed many people's lives .
The strong radiation of the explosion even influenced all the North Hemisphere .
What a tragedy it is !
Depending our future on nuclear power , we cannot guarantee there will be no such kind of explosion any longer .
Using water power can just slightly reduce the pressure on the energy .
That is because the consuption of energy is so large nowadays that even though we make full use of water power , it is still far less than the consumption .
Undeniably , the technology of solar power convertion today is still not perfect .
Many improvements should be made to increase the convertion rate and lower the cost of the equipment so it can be pervaded .
Nevertheless , this does not affect solar power to be the most ideal energy for the future .
Compared to other energy , solar power has three big advantages .
The first is that it is very clean .
Actually , the sunlight is electramagnetic wave .
During the convertion to electrical power , there is no emission of poisonous gas or water .
The second is that soalr power is very safe .
Unlike the nuclear power or water power , we never need to worry about the explosion of the powerhouse nor the collapse of dams caused by the strong water stream .
Nowadays , we already have built some solar powerhouses but we never hear anything unfortunate happens .
Last but most importantly , solar power seems endless .
Only if the sun disappears will the soalr power be used up .
However , as we know , the life of the sun is more than billions of years .
Therefore , for the three advantages above , we can find it really meaningful to develop the solar power tachnology .
Furthermore , during the development of solar power technology , we should pay more attention to solving the difficulty of the pervasion .
This means that we will apply the technolgy to every household so that most solar power shining on the earth can be converted .
Lowering the cost of the application is also very important , otherwise nobody is willing to adopt this technology .
In conclusion , to maintain the sustainable development of our society , we should give priority to the current human need to develope more energy from various source of human society .
Among the diverse energy source , solar power has the brightest prospect for its non-pollution , safety and infinitude .
Hence , it is really worthwhile to develop solar power to make our society development sustainable .
Moreover , during the development of solar power technology , we should try to increase the efficiency of the power convertion and lower the price of the products .
From a luxurious entertaining appliance in the early stage of development , television becomes an indispensable and ubiquitous thing within every family nowadays .
With millions of viewers around the world , it is used for various purposes not only by broadcasters and institutions but also businesses .
Television had to go through a very long way of development with reciprocal influences on society .
Advertising has become the most effective way of promoting sales of products .
The use of them is the most influential factor contributing to the development of television .
The cost of a television commercial depends upon the popularity of the channel and the time when it is broadcast .
These costs are the financial backing of broadcasters' programming .
Another way is to weave advertisements into shows .
This practice has begun in film .
For instance , a character may be driving a particular type of automobile , wearing a certain kind of clothes , or eating at a particular chain restaurant .
A brand or trademark sometimes is used .
In terms of advantages , I strongly believe that the benefits television brings to our society are undeniable .
Meyrowitz , a professor of communications at the department of Communication at the University of New Hampshire in Durham , deduced that television is the "secret-exposing machine" , and it opens up the "biggest secret of all , 'the secret of secrecy'" to children .
It is even claimed that television has replaced printing to become the main way to access information .
Researchers suggest that children who were exposed to educational programs , positive models preferred reading books , were more artistic and got higher grades .
Nowadays virtually all the broadcasters have at least an educational program for their own .
That's because of the high demand of parents , institutions and educationists .
However , television also brings more negative influences on our society as many as the positive ones .
A lot of findings showed that people tend to imitate the language and behavior which are inappropriate in society .
Children addicted to televisions are associated with obesity , passiveness , heath's problems and sometimes bad grades .
Inappropriate contents are deemed as another type of dangers to the youth .
Violence , sex , drugs abusing , nonsense comics , etc .
cause a lot of controversies over the right age of watching them and the youth are subject to parental television control , especially when it influences their self-esteem and body image .
With carefully-nurturing parents , a child can greatly benefit from television programs whereas the child may encounter inappropriate contents if the parents let him or her freely use devices .
Adults who spend too much time on TV viewing seem to be the unsatisfied people because they try to look for happiness in those programs after a hard struggling day .
However it is usually short time happiness .
In addition to this , broadcasters often have some shows and programs addressing women in the new century .
Television played a vital role in the feminist movement .
It is in dispute whether television has been changing the norms of society .
In conclusion , television has obviously contributed a lot to determine and shape our society , owe the strong links between its development history and the human's one .
That is the reason why we always have to improve it , to nurture it .
We have to balance the pros and cons as well as the relationship of television to our present and future generations .
In the 21st century when people around the world get more opportunities to interact with each other , the ability to speak and understand other languages has become more and more important .
Most people choose to hire a translator .
However , the well-trained ones are hard to find and they are not always available at times when you need them immediately .
Moreover , some people feel that their privacy is not preserved with a translator involved .
Thus , we have initiated this product called "N-in-1 Auto- translator" which can help solve all those problems mentioned above .
In the following paragraphs , the design process of our product will be illustrated to show how we fulfill people's need to communicate with people speaking different languages .
Having talked about the modifications , we have made efforts to minimize the cost , change the charging method and improve the portability .
As a brand new product which people do not have much faith in , it has been made reasonably affordable .
As batteries are not environmental friendly , we make use of the DC chargers instead .
This is very convenient for the customers and they do not have to change batteries all the time as the lifetime of the chargeable battery is purposely made longer .
In addition , we have had the device more portable by minimizing the size and weight .
For example , our device has many components consisting of a scanner , a speaker , a printer and a recorder .
This allows our product to be multi-functional in contrast with an electric dictionary which has many limitations .
Customers do not have to bring them all .
Instead , they can just selectively plug-in any component they need in order to make it much more portable .
Form this example , we can see that we engineers always think from customers' point of view and try our best to fulfill their needs .
Moreover , we should also take care of the interests of small groups of people .
Our target customers are businessman , travelers , international school teachers and students and other people who have needs to understand other languages .
However , after reviewing all those feedbacks on our official website , we found that the blind also need it .
After numerous research , we found that they recognize things by touching , smelling and hearing .
Thus we made modifications on our device such as the Braille-mini- printer .
This mini-printer can print in Braille so that they can understand by touching the paper after they scan the documents in other languages .
We can see that just a little change can benefit a large number of people .
To sum-up all the points mentioned above , we would conclude that engineering design processes can meet people's needs by qualified products and services , continuous modifications and the attitude to think for customers .
There is an old saying goes , "Customer is the god ."
We totally agree with it .
We engineers must always keep ourselves upgraded and think for the customers all the time so that we can make upgrades and modifications to meet their needs .
While one is looking for A , he may discover B accidentally along the way , and this process is called the serendipitous discovery .
It is very different from the normal technologies we have , which are resulted from developments aiming to solve specific questions .
They are also different from each other in terms of level of success and how well they cater to solve a problem .
Nonetheless , besides so many differences , they are also similar in the aspects that they are both important and can only be discovered by prepared minds .
One obvious difference is how each technology is discovered .
The normal technology is found and developed by following certain procedures .
For example , a problem or need is always first identified , and then people start to brainstorm and think of solutions for the problem .
They always have a clear purpose or goal in mind which leads them in a certain direction to resolve the puzzle .
Nevertheless , for technologies found through serendipitous discovery , they show complete randomness .
They are absolutely unexpected .
While one is solving some physics question , he may derive a solution for a biological problem in an approach which no one has thought of before .
There is nothing like a plan or preparation for this .
Hence , the two technologies differ from each other greatly in the ways how they are discovered .
Another difference between them may be the desirability .
Most of the time , serendipitously discovered technologies gain more recognition and greater success in terms of economic or scientific aspects , compared to the average normally developed technologies .
This is just lke what Lawren Block said , the thing one found while looking for something else , usually suited his needs more .
The reason behind this is that serendipitous discoveries cater to solve the problems in more ingenious ways , as they may be the results of some unknown happenings , and they are produced by following some rules of the nature we have yet to gain an understanding of  , which are mysterious but also powerful .
A simple example would be the success of Dichloro- diphenyl-trichloroethane , compared to other insecticides .
Nonetheless , apart from the differences , there are also similarities between these two kinds of technologies .
One major similarity they share is that both can only be discovered by prepared personnel .
As what Louis Pasteur has said , in the arena of observation , opportunities favor only the prepared minds .
This is indeed very true .
When people see some new products or discoveries , especially those close to our daily lives , sometimes they cannot help but ask themselves why when they have experienced some similar things , they failed to turn them into innovations or products .
In our daily lives , it is true that we may experience this or that kind of things , but it is only those careful ones , prepared ones , those who always pay more attention to tiny things happening around them and treat things seriously , come up with ingenious discoveries .
One needs to be prepared to identify a potential serendipitous discoveries , as well as to develop a normal technology , so that he does not miss out any important details and gain success in the end .
In conclusion , these two main problems basically hamper the research and development area of engineering design process , Singapore engineers could only at the moment upgrade of modifies existing innovations .
Thus they are the reasons why local Singaporean engineers have failed to come out with a stunning innovation yet .
A serendipity found is defined as accidently and unexpectedly discovering something fortunate .
One technology that was discovered by serendipity is sound-powered telephone .
Unlike to a serendipity invention , a product or system that is created or developed , not coming from accidents , but through a series of engineering design processes is a research invention , and a technology developed via research is the mobile phone .
For these two technologies , there are several similarities and differences in the aspects of their usages , the power supplies they need , the communication efficiencies and health concerns .
Firstly , compare the usages for both the sound-powered telephone and the mobile phone , they are similar in the way that both are used for communications .
However , the ways they are being used are different .
The sound-powered telephone is now widely used in naval vessels , and also in emergency communication systems for high-rise buildings , airports and ski lifts etc , whereas a mobile phone is designed for calling contacts .
Unlike to a sound-powered telephone , extra functions are included in a mobile phone , providing games , music and camera for use .
Secondly , the sound-powered telephone differs from the mobile phone in power supplies they need .
The speaker's voice , through its microphone unit , supplies necessary power for operating the sound-powered telephone .
Batteries or power connections are not required .The circuit is always live , thus a user simply begins speaking rather than dialing another station .
On the contrary , the mobile phone could not operate without the use of an external power , normally a battery must be included and charged , so that the mobile phone can be switched on .
Lastly , for engineers , design a safe product is a big concern .
The mobile phone emits electromagnetic radiation , which may harm one's health if using it for long period of time .
However , the sound-powered telephone does not pose any health risks to human beings due to its relatively simpler circuits compared to the mobile phone .
For the past few centuries , engineers and scientists have been working together , resulting to numerous great discoveries and inventions benefiting mankind in various aspects .
However , as science and technology evolves , they had also brought up numerous problems .
In this essay , I will be focusing on the environmental issues that were brought about by the improvement of science and technology and how can engineering design processes meet the need .
From the late 19th to early 20th century , there was an outburst of great discoveries and inventions , coupled with worldwide expansion of industrialisation , creating many machines to aid human needs , and wants .
The sudden out-break of these events had caused several negative impacts on Earth .
One of the most prominent examples is global warming , a result due to the existence of greenhouse gases .
Global warming causes the increase of the average temperature of Earth , which results in major problems such as melting ice caps at both poles , rising sea levels , heat waves and depleting ozone layer .
During the golden period of invention of machineries and industrialisation , machines running primarily on fossil fuels emit large quantity of greenhouse gases during incomplete combustion of fuels .
These harmful gases have resulted in the vast pollution of the globe .
And , the situation continues to worsen .
It was only until the late 20th century when the environmentalists discover that the greenhouse gases are harmful and have resulted in adverse conditions on Earth and started countering the pollution .
